title: Shirley Birthday, Church Complaints, JAB Health, NFL Update and more.
itunes:title: Shirley Birthday, Church Complaints, JAB Health, NFL Update and more.
description:
Good morning and Happy Belated Birthday to our very own Shirley Strawberry!  Shirley tells us a birthday memory and someone from the crew got food poisoning over the weekend.  The Lion King still is dominating the box office and we hear what everyone likes the most out of the movie.  The President is beefing with the city of Baltimore and there is another mass shooting, this time in Northern California.  Pray for Gilroy.  Fool #2 is in great spirits as he updates us on his treatment.  Is Adrian Peterson of the Redskins broke?  The players have reported to training camp and Junior gives us his opinion on next season in NFL Update.  In J's What We Learned Today, extended phone time and more is discussed.  Enjoy your day!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
